name: Youtube-dlForExtension
description:
Attention
This add-on alone does not work.
Look at the description.

Youtube-dl is a command-line program for downloading videos and music from YouTube and other sites.
Youtube-dlForExtension is the one that made this easy to use from Firefox.
You need to communicate with Youtube-dl.
However it requires a file download and (win:registry changes)(others:Python3.7.4 or higher install) to communicate.

Look at ' Youtube-dlForExtension/your platform/readme.txt ' from here.
nhttps://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Z2t8F5grpS4x_o54yuQMIJ01YrI16YBm?usp=sharing

The installation method is written there.

Setup support&Requests&Bugs, etc.
  SHiii0410223@gmail.com
or
  https://github.com/Shi-553/Youtube_dlForExtension

[new]
Installer for windows is now ready.
It's easier to set up.
